text:
http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/mod/mpm_common.html#maxmemfree

Default:	MaxMemFree 2048

When not set, or when set to zero, the threshold will be set to unlimited.

The above two seems self-contradictory. If I do not set the MaxMemFree Directive, it's unlimited or it's 2048?
creator: tixu@cs.ucsd.edu
covener@gmail.com
text: Thanks, resolved in 2.4.x and trunk [where the default had been recently updated to 2048 from 0]
